thread.title: BRIEF-Radisys Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.50

title: BRIEF-Radisys Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.50
text:
15 PM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-Radisys Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.50 Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Radisys Corp: * RADISYS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS * Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.01 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.50 * Q4 REVENUE $32.3 MILLION VERSUS $40.6 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.08 TO $0.12 * SEES Q1 2018 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.18 TO $0.22 
* SEES Q1 2018 ‍REVENUE BETWEEN $22 MILLION TO $24 MILLION​ 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.06, REVENUE VIEW $30.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.11, REVENUE VIEW $22.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
